title: ERD/Linux Dual Boot using syslinux error

forumNotes.author: hikenboot
forumNotes.content:
Greetings I have been building a boot flash drive that boots linux and windows using a method posted here jaklaz and a couple others. I get the following boot error trying to load the windows image  

Loading boot sector...booting.   

Any ideas?  

thanks,  

hikenboot

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
> Any ideas?

Several ones! ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)   

Mainly:  
1) I guess you should change your nick to **hiken*NOT*boot**   
![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  
2) You could re-use the "Standard Reply #32" given here:  
[http://www.boot-land...?...2587\&hl=#32](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=2587&hl=#32 "External link")  

***Seriously*** , if you do not report EXACTLY what you did, there is no way for us to help you.  

Please check "Common Sense Advice" in Rules:  
[http://www.boot-land...?act=boardrules](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?act=boardrules "External link")  
with particular attention to point #d.  

And post some details.  

Also, my nick is ja**c** laz, not ja**k** laz, it's not a problem the mis-spelling ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif), but if you did a similar one while doing any of the procedures to make a USB flash drive bootable, that could be the reason why it does not work. ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  

jaclaz

forumNotes.author: Oggy512
forumNotes.content:
Hi, i have the same problem. My USB Stick is booting already. I can boot Floppy images linke Partitionmagic \& co. I can also boot Puppylinux and DSLinux. But i tried to boot the ERD Commander (2k3), and it won't do it. I've read severel pages of this an another Forum, and i do all what there is written but it doesen't work. Can u help me? note: i made it this way, using syslinux: [http://www.911cd.net...o...c=18846\&hl=](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=18846&hl= "External link") i also modded the iso like this: [http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=10482](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=10482 "External link")
if i boot the erd, it will load the files in ram, but then, when the erd start, i get de error "txtsetup.sif is missing" i got the suspicion that there is no access to the iso from erd....
have u an idea?
thank you very much! ps. my english isn't very good, i'm form germany... so excuse my miss-spelling ![:lol:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/laugh.png)

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
Cannot say right now what could be the problem, but do recheck what you did against this one:  
[http://www.911cd.net...o...19676\&st=34](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=19676&st=34 "External link")  

DO NOT use ERD on a PC running VISTA:  
[http://www.911cd.net...o...19676\&st=23](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=19676&st=23 "External link")  

If it's ok for you using a disk img instead of a .iso, check this also:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=2958](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/?showtopic=2958 "External link")  

jaclaz
